statements: SELECT * FROM tournament_brackets
SELECT bracket_name, playoff_round FROM tournament_brackets WHERE championship_year = 2021
SELECT bracket_name, championship_year FROM tournament_brackets ORDER BY playoff_round DESC
SELECT COUNT(bracket_id) FROM tournament_brackets
SELECT DISTINCT championship_year FROM tournament_brackets
SELECT * FROM tournament_brackets WHERE championship_year = 2021;
SELECT bracket_id, bracket_name FROM tournament_brackets WHERE playoff_round = 3 ORDER BY bracket_id DESC;
SELECT bracket_name, championship_year FROM tournament_brackets WHERE playoff_round > 1 ORDER BY championship_year, bracket_id;
SELECT * FROM tournament_brackets WHERE playoff_round < 4 AND championship_year > 2019;
SELECT bracket_id, tournament_brackets.bracket_name, playoff_round, championship_year FROM tournament_brackets ORDER BY playoff_round ASC, championship_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM tournament_brackets;
SELECT bracket_name, number_of_teams FROM tournament_brackets;
SELECT * FROM championship_history WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT team_name, championship_type FROM championship_history WHERE championship_type = 'Grand Slam';
SELECT * FROM tournament_brackets ORDER BY number_of_teams DESC;
SELECT bracket_name, number_of_teams FROM tournament_brackets WHERE number_of_teams > 10 ORDER BY bracket_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, year FROM championship_history WHERE championship_type = 'World Cup' ORDER BY year DESC, team_name ASC;
SELECT championship_type, COUNT(*) AS total_championships FROM championship_history GROUP BY championship_type ORDER BY total_championships DESC;
SELECT team_name, MAX(year) AS latest_championship_year FROM championship_history GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT bracket_name, SUM(number_of_teams) AS total_teams FROM tournament_brackets GROUP BY bracket_name HAVING SUM(number_of_teams) > 20 ORDER BY total_teams DESC;
SELECT * FROM tournament_brackets;
SELECT team1, team2, winner FROM tournament_brackets WHERE bracket_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(bracket_id) AS total_brackets FROM tournament_brackets;
SELECT team_name, wins, losses FROM playoff_standings ORDER BY wins DESC;
SELECT champion_team, runner_up_team, year FROM championship_history ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM tournament_brackets WHERE bracket_id = 1;
SELECT bracket_name, team1, team2 FROM tournament_brackets WHERE winner IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_brackets, team1, team2, winner FROM tournament_brackets GROUP BY winner;
SELECT DISTINCT team_name, wins, losses FROM playoff_standings WHERE wins > 10;
SELECT year, champion_team, runner_up_team, mvp_player FROM championship_history WHERE champion_team != runner_up_team;
SELECT bracket_name, team1_id, team2_id FROM tournament_brackets WHERE league_id = 1;
SELECT playoff_name, playoff_round, league_id FROM playoff_standings ORDER BY playoff_round DESC;
SELECT champion_team_id, year FROM championship_history WHERE league_id = 2 AND year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020;
SELECT league_name, league_location, established_year FROM basketball_leagues WHERE commissioner = 'Adam Silver';
SELECT * FROM basketball_leagues WHERE established_year < 2000;
SELECT * FROM tournament_brackets WHERE league_id = 1;
SELECT bracket_name, team1_id, team2_id FROM tournament_brackets WHERE bracket_id = 5;
SELECT league_name, league_location FROM basketball_leagues WHERE established_year > 2000;
SELECT * FROM playoff_standings WHERE playoff_round IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT champion_team_id, year FROM championship_history ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM tournament_brackets;
SELECT bracket_id, bracket_name FROM tournament_brackets ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, wins, losses FROM playoff_standings WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT championship_year, championship_title FROM championship_history WHERE team_id = 5 ORDER BY championship_year ASC;
SELECT player_name, position, jersey_number FROM players WHERE team_id = 2 AND position = 'Point Guard';
SELECT * FROM tournament_brackets WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT bracket_name, end_date FROM tournament_brackets ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT team_name, wins, losses FROM playoff_standings WHERE wins > 10 AND losses < 5
SELECT player_name, position, jersey_number FROM players WHERE team_id = 5 ORDER BY jersey_number ASC
SELECT team_name, city, state FROM teams WHERE state = 'California'
